data.message: I love my president I am proud to be an American I wish he would have gotten all the support he should have he was trying to make our country better I liked most of his ideas

replies.message: He got a LOT of support. When he didn't get the support he needed, he went around Congress and made it a law anyway.  I don't know of any other president that  has done that. It's unconstitutional, but he did it anyway. No one stopped him. I would say that he receives a lot of support.  He's been allowed to do anything he wants. Legal or otherwise. As far as the media is concerned, he can do no wrong.
